titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve the annual wellness visit under the Medicare program.
Wellness and Education for Longer Lives for Seniors Act of 2021
WELL Seniors Act of 2021
Wellness and Education for Longer Lives for Seniors Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Wellness and Education for Longer Lives for Seniors Act of 2021 or the WELL Seniors Act of 2021
This bill includes balance screenings and services to address certain social determinants of health (e.g., food and housing security) as elements that may be covered in annual wellness visits under Medicare. The bill also provides incentive payments for visits that cover such elements.
